Title: Colvill Solid Wood Arm Chair In Teak Finish
Description: Woodsworth is our premium homegrown label thats part classic, part contemporary. A delectable amalgamation of the timeless and trendy, a precarious balance of function and flair. Woodsworth is a harmonious fit for all tastes, styles and spaces. Armchairs as the name suggests, comes with arms and a straight upright back. They can either be minimalist as in the bare wooden ones or the upholstered ones.  Furniture bought on Pepperfry.com comes with a 3 Year Warranty against any manufacturing defects. So go ahead and buy with confidence.
